Player History
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles (N) on 4/1/1965 (Going to LAN: CF A. Phillips, P W. Granger, P P. Edmondson, P J. James. Going to PHI: P S. Koufax, P P. Richert, SS M. Wills)...
